Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

14  KSGenEnergyRadonEvent::KSGenEnergyRadonEvent() :

20  fIsotope( 219 ),

43  KSGenEnergyRadonEvent::~KSGenEnergyRadonEvent()

46 
47  void KSGenEnergyRadonEvent::Dice( KSParticleQueue* aPrimaries )
48  {
49  KSParticle* tParticle;
50  KSParticleQueue tParticles;
51  KSParticleIt tParticleIt;
52 
53  for( tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); tParticleIt++ )
54  {
55 
56  //**********
57  //shake offs
58  //**********
59 
60  vector< int > shakeOffVacancy;
61  vector< double > shakeOffElectronEnergy;
62 
63  if( fDoShakeOff == true )
64  {
65  fMyShakeOff->SetForceCreation( fForceShakeOff );
66  fMyShakeOff->CreateSO( shakeOffVacancy, shakeOffElectronEnergy );
67 
68  for( unsigned int i = 0; i < shakeOffElectronEnergy.size(); i++ )
69  {
70  genmsg_debug( "KSGenEnergyRadonEvent:: Execute"<<ret );
71  genmsg_debug( "Vacancy at: "<< shakeOffVacancy.at(i) << ret );
72  genmsg_debug("Shake off electron energy: "<< shakeOffElectronEnergy.at(i) << eom );
73  fMyRelaxation->GetVacancies()->push_back( shakeOffVacancy.at( i ) );
74  tParticle = new KSParticle( **tParticleIt );
75  tParticle->SetKineticEnergy_eV( shakeOffElectronEnergy.at( i ) );
76  tParticle->SetLabel( "radon_shakeoff" );
77  tParticles.push_back( tParticle );
78  }
79  }
80  else
81  {
82  genmsg_debug( "KSGenGeneratorCompositeRadonEvent::Execute"<<ret );
83  genmsg_debug( "Shake-off electron generation not activated!" << eom );
84  }
85 
86  //******
87  //augers after shakeoff
88  //******
89 
90  if( fDoAuger == true )
91  {
92  if( shakeOffElectronEnergy.size() != 0)
93  {
94  fMyRelaxation->ClearAugerEnergies();
95  fMyRelaxation->Relax();
96 
97  for( unsigned int i = 0; i < fMyRelaxation->GetAugerEnergies().size(); i++ )
98  {
99 
100  genmsg_debug( "KSGenGeneratorCompositeRadonEvent::Execute"<<ret );
101  genmsg_debug( "Auger energy: "<<fMyRelaxation->GetAugerEnergies().at(i) << eom );
102  tParticle = new KSParticle( **tParticleIt );
103  tParticle->SetKineticEnergy_eV( fMyRelaxation->GetAugerEnergies().at( i ) );
104  tParticle->SetLabel( "polonium_auger" );
105  tParticles.push_back( tParticle );
106  }
107  fMyRelaxation->ClearVacancies();
108  }
109  else
110  {
111  genmsg_debug( "KSGenGeneratorCompositeRadonEvent::Execute"<<ret );
112  genmsg_debug( "There is no vacancy, therefore no auger electron can be produced !" << eom );
113  }
114  }
115  else
116  {
117  genmsg_debug( "KSGenGeneratorCompositeRadonEvent::Execute"<<ret );
118  genmsg_debug( "Auger electron production not activated!" << eom );
119  }
120 
121  //***********
122  //conversions
123  //***********
124 
125  vector< int > conversionVacancy;
126  vector< double > conversionElectronEnergy;
127 
128  if( fDoConversion == true )
129  {
130  fMyConversion->SetForceCreation( fForceConversion );
131  fMyConversion->CreateCE( conversionVacancy, conversionElectronEnergy );
132 
133  for( unsigned int i = 0; i < conversionElectronEnergy.size(); i++ )
134  {
135  genmsg_debug( "KSGenEnergyKryptonEvent:: Execute"<<ret );
136  genmsg_debug( "Vacancy at: "<< conversionVacancy.at(i) << ret );
137  genmsg_debug( " Conversion electron energy: "<< conversionElectronEnergy.at(i) << eom );
138  fMyRelaxation->GetVacancies()->push_back( conversionVacancy.at( i ) );
139  tParticle = new KSParticle( **tParticleIt );
140  tParticle->SetKineticEnergy_eV( conversionElectronEnergy.at( i ) );
141  tParticle->SetLabel( "polonium_conversion" );
142  tParticles.push_back( tParticle );
143  }
144  }
145  else
146  {
147  genmsg_debug( "KSGenGeneratorCompositeRadonEvent::Execute"<<ret );
148  genmsg_debug( "Conversion electron generation not activated!" << eom );
149  }
150 
151  //******
152  //augers after conversion
153  //******
154 
155  if( fDoAuger == true )
156  {
157  if(conversionElectronEnergy.size() != 0 )
158  {
159  fMyRelaxation->ClearAugerEnergies();
160  fMyRelaxation->Relax();
161  for( unsigned int i = 0; i < fMyRelaxation->GetAugerEnergies().size(); i++ )
162  {
163 
164  genmsg_debug( "Auger energy: "<<fMyRelaxation->GetAugerEnergies().at(i) << eom );
165  tParticle = new KSParticle( **tParticleIt );
166  tParticle->SetKineticEnergy_eV( fMyRelaxation->GetAugerEnergies().at( i ) );
167  tParticle->SetLabel( "polonium_auger" );
168  tParticles.push_back( tParticle );
169  }
170  fMyRelaxation->ClearVacancies();
171  }
172  else
173  {
174  genmsg_debug( "There is no vacancy, therefore no auger electron can be produced !" << eom );
175  }
176  }
177  else
178  {
179  genmsg_debug( "Auger electron production not activated!" << eom );
180  }
181 
182  //********************
183  //shell reorganization
184  //********************
185 
186  if( shakeOffElectronEnergy.size() == 0 && conversionElectronEnergy.size() == 0 )
187  {
188  double shellElectronEnergy;
189  double surplusEnergy;
190  shellElectronEnergy = KRandom::GetInstance().Uniform() * 230.;
191  surplusEnergy = 230. - shellElectronEnergy;
192  genmsg_debug( "shell reorganization electron energies: " <<surplusEnergy << " and "<< shellElectronEnergy << eom );
193 
194  //First Paricle
195  tParticle = new KSParticle( **tParticleIt );
196  tParticle->SetKineticEnergy_eV( shellElectronEnergy );
197  tParticle->SetLabel( "radon_shell_reorganisation" );
198  tParticles.push_back( tParticle );
199 
200  //Second Particle
201  tParticle = new KSParticle( **tParticleIt );
202  tParticle->SetKineticEnergy_eV( surplusEnergy );
203  tParticle->SetLabel( "radon_shell_reorganisation" );
204  tParticles.push_back( tParticle );
205  }
206  else
207  {
208  genmsg_debug( "shake-off or conversion electron was produced, therefore no shell reorganization can occur" << eom );
209  }
210 
211  }
212 
213  for( tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); tParticleIt++ )
214  {
215  tParticle = *tParticleIt;
216  delete tParticle;
217  }
218 
219  aPrimaries->assign( tParticles.begin(), tParticles.end() );
220 
221  return;
222  }
223

225  {
226  fForceShakeOff = aSetting;
227  }

229  {

231  }

233  {
234  fDoShakeOff = aSetting;
235  }
236  void KSGenEnergyRadonEvent::SetDoConversion( bool aSetting )
237  {
238  fDoConversion = aSetting;
239  }
240  void KSGenEnergyRadonEvent::SetDoAuger( bool aSetting )
241  {
242  fDoAuger = aSetting;
243  }
244  void KSGenEnergyRadonEvent::SetIsotope( int anIsotope )
245  {
246  fIsotope = anIsotope;
247  }
248 
249  void KSGenEnergyRadonEvent::InitializeComponent()
250  {
251  genmsg_debug( "reading shake-off, conversion and relaxation data for radon..." << eom );
252 
253  fMyShakeOff = new KSGenShakeOff();
254 
255  fMyConversion = new KSGenConversion();
256  fMyConversion->Initialize( fIsotope );
257 
258  fMyRelaxation = new KSGenRelaxation();
259  fMyRelaxation->Initialize( fIsotope );
260 
261  genmsg_debug( "...all data read, instances of shake-off, conversion and relaxation class created" << eom );
262 
263  return;
264  }
265  void KSGenEnergyRadonEvent::DeinitializeComponent()
266  {
267  delete fMyShakeOff;
268  delete fMyConversion;
269  delete fMyRelaxation;
270  return;
271  }
272
